GlobalValueSet.description: Defines a type for transaction: "callcentre" Used for a call centre transaction. Transaction is flagged as a telephone order to the Issuer. "cardpresent" Used for reporting purposes only. Transaction is flagged as a telephone order to the Issuer. "ecommerce" Used for a real time customer internet transaction. Transaction is flagged as an internet order to the Issuer. internet" Used for a real time customer internet transaction. Transaction is flagged as an internet order to the Issuer. "ivr" Used for an automated phone (IVR) transaction. Transaction is flagged as a telephone order to the Issuer. "mailorder" Used for a mail order transaction. Transaction is flagged as a mail order to the Issuer. "telephoneorder" Used for a telephone order transaction. Transactions is flagged as a telephone order to the Issuer.
